sentences.en: Channels can help, or you can put the numbers into a spreadsheet.
sentences.cn: 通道能起帮助作用, 你也可以把数字填进电子表格.

sentences.en: Files are saved in spreadsheet compatible format for graphing manipulation and printing.
sentences.cn: 数据文件被保存用电子表格可用来计算、曲线制作和打印出来等.

sentences.en: In a spreadsheet, numbers or text are stored and displayed in cells.
sentences.cn: 在电子表中, 数字和文本在单元格中存放和显示.

sentences.en: In computer programming, a combined database management, spreadsheet and graphics package.
sentences.cn: 在计算机程序设计中, 一种兼有数据库管理 、 电子报表和绘图功能的组合程序.

sentences.en: In the spreadsheet, a single - click will select exactly one whole cell.
sentences.cn: 在电子表格中, 单击就是选择整个单元格.

sentences.en: It describes in detail how to simulate chemical kinetics on a spreadsheet.
sentences.cn: 它详细描述怎样类比关于一张电子表格的化学动力学.

sentences.en: Microsoft Excel dominates the spreadsheet market.
sentences.cn: 微软公司的Excel在电子表市场中占优势.

sentences.en: Presenting results in a static spreadsheet or table may do the job.
sentences.cn: 用统计电子表格或表来体现结果也一样.

sentences.en: So then a spreadsheet is like a huge calculation sheet.
sentences.cn: 所以报表就像大计算单一样.

sentences.en: Spreadsheet applications are computer programs that let you create and manipulate spreadsheets.
sentences.cn: 电子表格应用软件是一款让你创建和修改电子表格的电脑程序.

sentences.en: The infinite spreadsheet is product birthed out from this matured environment.
sentences.cn: 无限扩展计算方法就是在这样的环境中诞生的.

sentences.en: This spreadsheet contains all our sales and profit figures.
sentences.cn: 这份报表包括所有销售和盈利数字.

sentences.en: Unbound mode is also suited for spreadsheet - like or sparsely populated tables.
sentences.cn: 取消绑定模式还适用于类似于电子表格的表或稀疏填充的表.

sentences.en: While teaching, I used a spreadsheet as a grading program.
sentences.cn: 当教学时, 我使用电子表格作为定等级的程序.

sentences.en: You must photocopy the spreadsheet on A 3 paper.
sentences.cn: 我们应当订购一些A3型有抬头的便笺纸.

words.tran_cn: 电子制表软件；电子数据表；试算表

trans.tran_en: a computer program that can show and calculate financial information
